content.html: I hate it when people who hate me are assholes in my mentions, but I hate it even more when people who like me are assholes in my mentions. Who are you trying to impress? Me? My whole brand is trying to not be an asshole.
content.value:
I hate it when people who hate me are assholes in my mentions, but I hate it even more when people who like me are assholes in my mentions.

Who are you trying to impress? Me? My whole brand is trying to not be an asshole.
